query: I need assistance in planning a week-long vacation for 2 individuals, starting from Chattanooga and covering 3 cities in Georgia. This trip will span from March 24th to March 30th, 2022, with a budget cap at $6,800. We'll be traveling with our children who are under 10 years old, hence, accommodations must be children-friendly and should ideally be entire rooms. For this trip, we would prefer not to take any flights.
goal: Trip from Chattanooga to Georgia; start date: 2022-03-24; duration: 7 day(s); budget: $6800; people: 1; city count target: 3; preferences: children under 10, entire room; must cities: None; priority cities: None
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Atlanta,Augusta,Decatur]
